data.email:
Subject: Follow-Up: Dashboard Redesign & API Progress

Hi team,

Great to connect today and review our progress on the dashboard redesign and API reliability fixes. We covered a lot of ground and made some key decisions.

**Key Decisions**
• Finalize dashboard layout by Friday.
• Switch to the new authentication API for next release.

**Action Items**
• Alex — Test API latency improvements by Wednesday.
• Jordan — Submit dashboard UX revisions by Friday.

**Next Meeting:** Monday 9 AM

Looking forward to seeing these updates come together.
Thanks,
[Your Name]
